title: [macOS] Unsupported Architectures. Your executable contained the following disallowed architectures: '[i386 Payload/MacCoolApp.app/Contents/MonoBundle/libSkiaSharp.dylib)]'
body:
### Steps to Reproduce
1. Open https://github.com/olegoid/SubmissionSamples/tree/master/MacCoolApp
2. Install SkiaSharp as nuget package
3. Build and archive
4. Upload macapp.pkg to iTunesConnect

### Expected Behavior
Upload should be successful

### Actual Behavior

Failed with an error "ERROR: ERROR ITMS-90240: "Unsupported Architectures. Your executable contained the following disallowed architectures: '[i386 (in com.xamarin360.macpublishworkflow.pkg/Payload/MacCoolApp.app/Contents/MonoBundle/llibSkiaSharp.dylib)]'. New apps submitted to the Mac App Store must support 64-bit starting January 2018, and Mac app updates and existing apps must support 64-bit starting June 2018."

### Basic Information
- Version with issue:  1.60 - 1.60.3
- Last known good version:  <!-- the version of SkiaSharp that still working -->
- IDE: Visual Studio for Mac
- Platform Target Frameworks: .NET Core 2.0
  - macOS:  10.13
- Target Devices:
  -   Mac Mini, MacBook
